title: Quarkstollen (Christmas stollen with quark)
ingredients: ['500g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '200g caster sugar', '2 to 3 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 pinch salt', '4 drops almond extract', '1 dash rum', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 eggs', '125g butter', '250g quark or firm Greek yoghurt', '200g raisins', '125g ground nuts', '150g cut mixed peel', 'icing sugar for dusting']
